website_summaries.verdict: It's not for everyone –especially consumers who enjoy modern smartphone technology – but good for those who want an inexpensive, easy, basic phone.
pros: Consumers who prefer an old-school flip-phone are satisfied with this model's design and features
Super easy to set up and use
Budget price matches its basic design
cons: Lacks the bells and whistles and technology of other models, but if you prefer a flip phone chances are you won't care

customer_reviews.title: Flip Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone, price is reasonable. It has good sound. Easy to transfer my minutes and phone number. No need to get another phone number. Not as fancy as a smart-phone but I have no use for all the bells and whistles. It suits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had other Trafones but this was a waste of money!!!!! The battery would not hold a charge for more than a couple of days and then after a month, it died entirely. I still had almost 300 minutes left on it and 2 months of service with the card I had but when I bought a different Tracfone and tried to transfer the minutes, I was told I did not have any! I now have a different brand due to this phone and the treatment by the tracfone representative. I have had issues with the company before, so with this rotten phone AND the service, it was time to go to a different company and different phone!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great if you don’t need the high cost and features of a smartphone
customer_reviews.author: BoxsterSBob

customer_reviews.title: Great flip phone for someone that doesn't want a smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was easy to set up. My husband is pleased with it. I was concerned with battery life, as some of the reviews mentioned. I noticed the instructions said that you should initially charge for 5 hours, which was much longer than what it actually took to charge. I think this may have been missed by those that complained that the battery doesn't hold a charge well. We have not had battery issues.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: So thankful I found this Tracfone LG l442BG 3G flip phone yet
customer_reviews.text: I cracked the screen on my tracfone so couldn't see who was calling before answering. It is so hard to find quality flip phones now. I like flip phones because they don't take up as much room in my pocket when I go for a walk and I don't misdial by mistake. Not all of us want the smatphones. Nice quality phone, easy to use, no clicking here, then there, then there to just dial a number.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great for tech challenge people
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple flip phone, has text, takes pictures, you open it up and it's ready to use, no password needed. Hubbie had a smart phone and couldn't use it as he had trouble swiping to answer a call, hated having to enter a password to open it. Never texted anyone and never used the internet. This phone was perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: K. Turpin

customer_reviews.title: At first it works like a phone should by ringing first and if not ...
customer_reviews.text: At first it works like a phone should by ringing first and if not answered after five times ,would go to voicemail. Now all calls just kept going straight to voicemail. No rings or caller ID. I was missing all sorts of time sensitive calls. Powering off/on did not help. Searching the web shows this is common w/ Tracfone.
customer_reviews.author: DaBier

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality and Good Design
customer_reviews.text: If you like Flip Phones this is the One to get. Super Quality and Good Design. It's compact and easy to carry and can even send and receive text messages [sms]. I like that you can store up to 1,000 entries for your contacts. It's a really nice basic phone with all the essential features that you would need without having to upgrade to a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3g phones will not be supported after the end of 2020
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of these and they have worked fine but this prices is a joke and unless Verizon changes its mind and extends its 3g coverage your expensive phone will be useless in 9 months. Buy a 4g phone which is what I expect to have to do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Just too small to use with ease
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are too small, and my fingers are not large. Just not the right fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: So far -- seems to have reception where I need ...
customer_reviews.text: So far -- seems to have reception where I need it. Not fancy, but it works. A flip phone is what I wanted. Bought it for emergency use and, otherwise, have no need for a cell phone at this point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Cell Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for a simple basic cell phone for making calls. I personally don't care about the texting or internet access, I have an ipad for emailing and internet access. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: deploycatattack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: For my husband who is technically challenged. Perfect for him, and simple. I hope this product is never discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: TracFone LG L442BG 3G Prepaid Phoneby "Design Tactics"
customer_reviews.text: Phone is a GSM never used. Works great thanks to "Design Tactics"! When registering, I had to change zip code because Tracfone didn't cover my zip where I live even though I had full bars! I recommend "Design Tactics", they treated me more than fairly and they were knowledgeable. Will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for my 10 year old. I didn’t think he was old enough for a smartphone and was wanting something more basic for him to have as a way to call me. The phone also came with coupons for purchasing minutes that was really useful. So far he loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: FlipPhone
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband, who had no desire for anything more than a basic phone. It suits his needs just fine. Price was a little higher than I would have liked, but couldn't find this model anywhere else. Liked the fact that it came with double minutes for life. Shipping was prompt and set-up was easy. Was able to complete set-up online, without having to call customer service, which I was dreading.
customer_reviews.author: salinla

customer_reviews.title: 05/11/2018 This has been the nicest backup phone.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the nicest backup phone. It has been reliable thus far, May 11, 2018, and the useage is easy as can be. I am very glad that we chose to go this route. I have thanked them for their fine service, too on Twitter. Very nice and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Phone is not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not an android and it does not have a 4-inch screen I have a phone I paid 20 dollars for and is much better I can not believe it was advertised as an android phone and the screen was over 4 inches. very disappointed in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic communication
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, great reception, I can do all that I need to do, talk, text, etc. Highly recommend for those that don't really need a smart phone. PC
customer_reviews.author: PCochran

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie.
customer_reviews.text: Good flippers getting harder to find. Bought this as back up, same phone my non-techie husband currently uses. Just needed a phone for calling and texting. Small size a plus for him. Price considerably more than that listed on package. Tracfone doesn't carry this phone on their site any more. Too bad. People like them. Bad decision. Others may go to another carrier to get the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect until today. Same problem as the old phone. The battery is overheating. The phone is dialing numbers from my list.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Forthofer

customer_reviews.title: For talking only
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, easy-to-use phone that's just right for my 90-year-old father to call his pals. He doesn't text or have interest in anything but a lightweight and portable telephone. If you want to do more than converse, this is probably not the model for you. But I was glad to find it. My chatty old dad loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: I really do not know how to rate this, I bought it for my 97 yr old mom, so far it work fine for her, so I recon it is working out fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very bad battery life and.very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: the phone is just OK not great by any means, the battery life is bad. and very poor customer service Trackfone just lost a 15+ year customer
customer_reviews.author: THESTEVEO

customer_reviews.title: TracFone over a SmartFone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second TracFone. after a while I bought a SmartPhone but didn't like it as it was too hard for me to use so, I went and bought me another TracFone. So much easier to use and I could even hear better on it. Thank you TracFone.
customer_reviews.author: GIGI

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, barely
customer_reviews.text: The battery cover was always loose. I should have returned it. Now I have lost the cover, It still works luckily. Tracfone website is not very helpful. I couldn't find the manual for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Binoche

customer_reviews.title: Please cancel replacement order. My husband got it working ...
customer_reviews.text: Please cancel replacement order. My husband got it working. Message was on the wrong setting. So sorry for any inconvenience. When I receive the replacement, I will send it back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone. Not as delicate as big screen phones. Easier to use. Plan is flexible and easy to purchase as you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lorusso

customer_reviews.title: Phone was exactly as advertised, but unfortunately went through ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone was exactly as advertised, but unfortunately went through the washer in the first week so really can’t give a fair evaluation. If you’re looking for something waterproof, this isn’t it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Owen Daniels

customer_reviews.title: perfect simple phine
customer_reviews.text: battery life is not ideal but otherwise i'm very happy with the phone and the quality. perfect phone for basic functions which is just what i wanted. good deal and great seller
customer_reviews.author: bingo ringo

customer_reviews.title: Customer service review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cell phone hoping that it would meet my needs but when I received it, I was disappointed. It looked and felt like it wouldn't last long. I returned it immediately with $7,75 postage and has to pay a $30.00 return fee. For $200.00 I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: had this tracfone 2 weeks stopped working could call out ...
customer_reviews.text: had this tracfone 2 weeks stopped working could call out but could not hear the person talk back could not turn the mute off
customer_reviews.author: sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does double minutes, works well for a back up on call phone.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This model was far superior to the TracFone LG Rebel 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone -CDMA Variant Handset which we had to return when it couldn't pick up a signal at our home where 2 other cell phones didn't have signal problems.
customer_reviews.author: ridealong

customer_reviews.title: Good basic phone for talking
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it to talk only, if that's all you need, this is a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Weaver

customer_reviews.title: would NOT buy again,too small buttons for my old eyes.
customer_reviews.text: works ok,after looo0ng complacated start up,but phone much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the I one I had before for a long time
customer_reviews.author: DaveBarnett

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Speedy shipping. Exceeded my expectations. Fidelity of the phone is a concern. I have replaced 5, iPhones7 since August 2017. In each case the receiving party could not understand me. Voice broken up. I/they still can't figure out the problem. Tried many combinations of settings. Last iteration has worked two weeks. I need reliable commo. This is cheap, simple and so far a good phone. I can do without all the apps on the iPhone. I have an iPad for the bells and whistles. One caution. The LG phone is plastic, so a drop may destroy it.. Hey what the heck, it was $12.99.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: suits me just fine for a dinosaur phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone was to replace my old phone, suits me just fine for a dinosaur phone, haha
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: They are very happy with this rather basic phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my older parents after they insisted the had to have a smartphone and could never figure out how to use it. They are very happy with this rather basic phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Baby, I've missed you so much
customer_reviews.text: Very simple phone. I use the alarms for work. Easy to set up. Bluetooth, text, volume, all good.
customer_reviews.author: F. Turner

customer_reviews.title: wonderfully simple
customer_reviews.text: I like it most because it's a basic phone and it does every thing I want. I don't need all that other stuff that smart phones have.
customer_reviews.author: thomas merrihew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for a basic inexpensive phone works just fine for me wasn't expecting much just a simple backup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: phone is fine was difficult to get turned on via trc phone
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Decieving
customer_reviews.text: Dosent come with any minutes. You must immediately Activa te with service plan or buy separate minutes.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be a good, simple cell phone
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good, simple cell phone, able to place and receive telephone calls at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: But if you’re looking for just a basic phone function very well
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t big on this phone/I had to keep turning it off and on just to get the service
customer_reviews.author: Unlesskiks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for us but I don't like all their promotion calls.
customer_reviews.author: judy d schoesler

customer_reviews.title: tracfone by acarr  LG442BG
customer_reviews.text: i received the tracfone from acarr there was no battery or back cover in box when it came today for phone
customer_reviews.author: gunsmoke45

customer_reviews.title: Seller...Prompt Delivery.  Product...Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I wanted. Just a phone, with some great perks.
customer_reviews.author: LAVART

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good for old man. Granddaughter put in phone numbers and it works.
customer_reviews.author: suitcase

customer_reviews.title: Brand new in the box!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flip phone! Many features all useful! Had been properly scanned at point of sale to make activation a breeze! volume plenty loud!
customer_reviews.author: James  C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple phone with nice loud sounds & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Randye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone. The price was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: had this for less then 2 months n it messed up
customer_reviews.author: gerri

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Phone for older people
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect phone for my 85 yr old husband! Easy to use! We buy year card to add minutes , no contract! We find specials for minutes on line.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie Boales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use without any hidden gadgets if you don’t want a smartphone
customer_reviews.author: Jose Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Get it right
customer_reviews.text: Dislike this phone your false information was incorrect so I return it back please refunds my money
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Won’t text
customer_reviews.text: Phone works as expected except that you cannot text with it. It will not print what you are typing
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ploss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for simple calls!
customer_reviews.text: If you just need a simple phone for communication, this is the phone for you!
customer_reviews.author: cindi

customer_reviews.title: Drains battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts 1 to 2 days and the low battery signal sounds like a loud clown horn.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: good basic phone
customer_reviews.text: this is a great basic phone easy to use and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: wireman

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: I thought it cost to much though, I won't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I got a prompt refund, without question.
customer_reviews.text: got no cell phone reception at home, not a single bar
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone. Easy to use, just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my brother in nursing home in another.county.3 g works as "home" Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: tookiefroodle4.6l

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: unable to charge it after only a month of use
customer_reviews.author: Nicky C.  Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I like the features of a flip ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I like the features of a flip phone. Very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: My promotion had already expired when I got my phone and I wasn’t told that I had to buy a pin to activate the phone
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: The phone’s screen went black on week after the return window closed. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with the phone except that it is locked ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the phone except that it is locked and we haven't got an unlock code. Was the item scanned before being despatch. is it possible to get an unlock code for the phone to be able to use it as it is not block from the receiving country.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Flip phones on Virgin are Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: even though I loved this phone it is obsolete and can not be used with Virgin...peace
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Galvan A Divine Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, hard to get back off
customer_reviews.text: I would love to have kept this phone but I didn't get service in my area. Also, the problem I had was getting the back off so I could put the battery in. It's really hard to open it. I may have sent it back just because of that. I had to send it back because of the lack of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed it was undamaged
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is exactly what I expected. Works well. My main complaint is how this item was delivered. It was a very wet, snowy day and the driver appeared to have just thrown it out his window into my driveway, directly behind my parked car and in the snow. Package was not even visible from the front door, we had to search for it. Package was soaking wet. As this is an electronic item, I'm amazed it was undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lee

customer_reviews.title: 4 wks old. doesnt turn on
customer_reviews.text: bought this for an 85 yr old woman in a retirement home. after 4 wks it wont even turn o... its fully charged and no matter what it wont even power on.
customer_reviews.author: cloudy skies

customer_reviews.title: This LG L442BG is just a nice, simple little flip phone
customer_reviews.text: This LG L442BG is just a nice, simple little flip phone. Sound/call clarity is good. Does exactly what I want it to (make phone calls). Dropped mine yesterday and I thought "Crap, busted phone." Nope...battery door popped back on and hardly a scratch. Comes with sim card so no worries there. Activation through tracfone was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Niederkorn

customer_reviews.title: THE DESCRIPTION IS WRONG -- DOES NOT COME WITH TALK TIME
customer_reviews.text: The phone does NOT come loaded with 3 hrs and 6 minutes of talk time. The 3 hrs, 6 min has to do with the battery life. You'll have to spend at least ~$20 to add talk time.
customer_reviews.author: TEG99

customer_reviews.title: this item is misrepresented by amazon and TracFone
customer_reviews.text: In my attempt to activate this 'prepaid' phone, I found out I had to purchase air time. The airtime card was NOT included. I feel I was cheated in this regard. In addition, I had to go out to a zip code 50 miles away from my home to find an area it would function in. This was a fraud. In addition, when I checked the coverage map on TracFone.com, it clearly included the area where I live. When I called their 1-800 number to activate, they said they didn't have coverage here or until I got 50 miles away. This is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Schrader

customer_reviews.title: No Charger
customer_reviews.text: Product description must be generic for their full lineup of products, because this is stated to come with a charger and none was supplied. Also, very unhappy with the 4G and 3G confusion.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: TracFone No Buneo
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked OK but the plan was both confusing and deceptive. Then I tried to add features Tracfone accepted payment only to find out the feature wouldn’t work with my phone (that I bought from TracFone). It took a long phone call through two layers of an international call center who I had challenges to understand to get a measly reimbursement. Then, when I pointed out the deception of the plan, the phone agent was incapable of explaining how it truly worked.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Runner

customer_reviews.title: No Touchscreen, not Android.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this phone because it`s simple like old time phones. BUT I give it only 2 stars because the description for the phone is incorrect!!! It says: 4.5" Touchscreen, Android 5.1... There is NO Touchscreen and it seems to me it`s not even Android. I can not download any apps. from Play store. I had to chat with Customer Service, who kept pointing my attention to this item`s description and I kept telling them about non-existing Touchscreen and Android... Finally they offered me to return this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: NO BATTERY INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: So, the phone came. Says charge the battery. What battery? Who sells a phone without a battery?
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: NOT A VALID TRACFONE
customer_reviews.text: unregistered sim card so phone CANNOT be activated, 2+ hours on line with TracFone customer service to find it out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless. I bought one of these and calls just kept randomly going to voicemail--some would ring the phone, but some would go to voicemail so I was missing all sorts of calls. I figured that that particular phone must be defective, so I bought another but the same thing is happening. This phone sucks and I'd never recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frank Parnell

customer_reviews.title: No batteries
customer_reviews.text: No battery included. States on the item's webpage that the lithium, batteries are included.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Simply, easy, phone for elders that don't need all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 98 year old mother, who wears hearing aids. This phone rings loud and she can hear the ringtone (along with vibration) much better than any of her old phones. I wanted something that was very simple to use, and this fits the bill. She likes this phone much better than the others she's had and is actually able to hold a decent conversation and tells me that she hears much better with it and doesn't have to remove her hearing aid (another plus as she lost one when calling a cab for herself). Great phone for the price and I can add minutes to it for her easily as I live 300 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: watcher

customer_reviews.title: love this phone
customer_reviews.text: love this phone, was hard to find this replacement. I use it simply for telephone, voice mail, it can text and has a camera, but I simply wanted a phone backup in my car, now I find I carry it with me all the time. It is easy to use, no fuss, no swipes, etc. I am going to buy another in case this not going to be made any more. Highly recommend if you are a "low tech" person.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Louise

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect phone for my older generation father. Simple & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Margret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, LG makes good flip phones, this model was better than anything available on the tracfone website
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY LITTLE TRACFONE
customer_reviews.text: I rarely if ever use a cell phone. I only carry one in my car for emergencies or a quickie phone call to my daughter when I'm about to pop in on her. I had a smart phone that I hated. I guess "geezers" like me don't like the newest and greatest when we really don't need them and, quite frankly, paying $30.00/month for something I didn't use seemed pointless. Now I can prepay a small amount of money so that I feel protected in case of need.
customer_reviews.author: Litlj43

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and starts up faster than our other ...
customer_reviews.text: We keep this ol dependable standby in our vehicle for emergencies in case we forget our regular phones. We fill it with minutes once a year. Very easy to use and starts up faster than our other phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ardis

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to get rid of my monthly payment.
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to use, exactly what I was looking for. I am simple minded.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Phillips

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Surprised that it talks to you. So far I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: phone and battery are great
customer_reviews.text: I've recharged the battery maybe 12 times since purchasing...the battery stays charged for 4-5 days which is great. Very easy to use of course. I had a flip phone years ago....lost it in the washing machine then picked up a smart-phone which I did not like at all, I was so glad to find this one still available. I only use the phone for emergency or convenient contact so this works out much better for me. The sound is typical of a flip phone which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wish setup was easier. Cell reception phenomenal.
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone who needs a simple no frills phone to call. Not so simple for texting. Setup took 2 days with customer service. I bought this to replace another flip phone that was too large for my petite frame (this fits my smaller face) I got it as an emergency phone for my 9 year old also. Cannot figure out how to set up a personal voicemail. Sound is incredible both pickup/receiving. I live in the country and the signal on my iPhone was blocked by a mountain ridge and service was spotty in my home...this phone has exceptional service in all parts/levels of my home. This is probably my favorite feature of this phone...cell reception.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Phony promo code card included can't be used.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is fine. It is a replacement for an identical one I had that was damaged and does what I want. However, the promotion card for additional minutes or money off that comes with it has promo codes with a phony expiration date and can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable feature phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love these LG flip phones. My son is very hard on phones, but this one keeps coming back for more. The ones he’s killed include death by drowning, death by car tire crushing, and death by toilet. This Lg puts up with being left outside, overheating, complete discharge, and dropping countless times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Alcatel!
customer_reviews.text: Threw away my second Alcatel (Lousy audio and needed recharge every day)and bought this one. My wife has an LG and it was so much better.....and so is this one! Battery lasts forever and audio is loud and clear. It was "almost" too easy to switch phone number and minutes....all automatic......but I forgot to try to make a phone call.......that's what makes it finish up the registration!
customer_reviews.author: RedRover

customer_reviews.title: TracFones are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, and has quite a few nice features for the price. Don't have to worry about unwanted surprises
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Not a Ludite, but I like small phones, not shrunken tablets pretending to be phones.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 smart phones, but I don't text and don't surf the web on them. If I want to surf the web, I use my computer with a 27 inch screen. I only need it for when I'm away from the house (more like the 70's with a CB radio). Sound quality is clear and clean, much less bulky in my pants pocket too. I had over 8000 minutes that transferred over to the new LG.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Jim

product_meta.title: TracFone LG L442BG 3G Prepaid Phone
product_meta.description: This TracFone LG 442G Prepaid Cell Phone serves as a useful alternative to people who don't want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this prepaid phone, you can pay as you go. This allows you to track the amount of money you're spending easily. The prepaid flip phone is easy to use and helps you keep track of your day-to-day. It comes fully loaded with a wide variety of applications, including internet access, text and picture messaging and an alarm clock. The phone book holds up to 1,000 entries, and the hands-free speaker allows you to connect easily while driving. Listen to your favorite tunes on the MP3 player, and take photos and videos to share with friends and family. This TracFone cell phone comes with up to 2.1 hours of talk time. It includes an activation card, a battery, a charger and a services guide.
